content: the **girly lace dream doily** is a flirty little piece with a light lacy vibe that adds instant charm wherever it lands go classic with a single color or mix things up with a fun two-tone combo - the end result totally dreamy pop it on your dining table for a fancy flair or let it double as a mandala in your chill-out zone whether you re new to the hook life or a seasoned stitch queen this project is a breeze to whip up and oh-so-satisfying made with a 2 mm hook and no 10 cotton thread or some delicate lace-weight yarn if you re feeling fancy it comes out to around 21 cm that s 8 2 inches of pure pretty have fun and happy stitching
